import React from'react';import{Link as RouterLink}from'react-router-dom';import Container from'@mui/material/Container';import Grid from'@mui/material/Grid';import Card from'@mui/material/Card';import CardContent from'@mui/material/CardContent';import CardMedia from'@mui/material/CardMedia';import CardActions from'@mui/material/CardActions';import Typography from'@mui/material/Typography';import Button from'@mui/material/Button';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductList(){// TODO: Replace with API call to backend
const products=[{id:1,name:'Product 1',price:19.99,description:'This is a great product with excellent features and quality.'},{id:2,name:'Product 2',price:29.99,description:'Premium product with advanced functionality and design.'},{id:3,name:'Product 3',price:39.99,description:'Top-of-the-line product for discerning customers.'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{maxWidth:"lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",component:"h1",gutterBottom:true,sx:{mb:4},children:"Our Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,spacing:4,children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,sm:6,md:4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{sx:{height:'100%',display:'flex',flexDirection:'column'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardMedia,{component:"div",sx:{height:200,backgroundColor:'grey.300'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{sx:{flexGrow:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{gutterBottom:true,variant:"h5",component:"h2",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"h6",color:"primary",gutterBottom:true,children:["$",product.price.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",color:"text.secondary",children:product.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardActions,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"small",component:RouterLink,to:"/products/".concat(product.id),children:"View Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"small",color:"primary",variant:"contained",children:"Add to Cart"})]})]})},product.id))})]});}export default ProductList;
